import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '../components/ui/Card'; import { Select, SelectContent, SelectItem, SelectTrigger, SelectValue } from '.'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, Line, PieChart, Pie, Cell, ScatterChart, Scatter } from 'recharts'; const DashboardApp = () => { // Sample data structure const data = [ { year: 2020, intensity: 75, likelihood: 80, relevance: 85, country: "United States", city: "New York", topic: "AI", sector: "Technology", pest: "Technological", source: "Research", swot: "Opportunity", region: "North America" } // Add more data here ]; // States for all filters const [filters, setFilters] = useState({ endYear: 'all', topic: 'all', sector: 'all', region: 'all', pest: 'all', source: 'all', swot: 'all', country: 'all', city: 'all' }); // Function to handle filter changes const handleFilterChange = (filterName, value) => { setFilters(prev => ({ ...prev, [filterName]: value })); }; return (
{/* Header */}

{/* City Filter */}

Average Intensity 75.5
Average Likelihood 80.2
Average Relevance 85.7
Total Countries 45

{/* Intensity & Likelihood Trends */} Intensity & Likelihood Trends
{/* Relevance by Region */} Relevance by Region
{/* Topics Distribution */} Topics Distribution
{data.map((entry, index) => ( ))}
{/* Country Analysis */} Country Analysis (Intensity vs Likelihood)
); }; export default DashboardApp;
